faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about AI agents

items.question: What are AI agents?
items.answer: AI agents are intelligent software programs that can autonomously perform complex tasks. Unlike simple rule-based automations, AI agents can make decisions, learn from experience, and adapt to new situations.

items.question: How long does it take to implement an AI agent?
items.answer: Implementation takes between 2-8 weeks depending on the complexity of the automated process and required integrations. We start with a functional MVP and iterate based on feedback.

items.question: Will AI agents replace employees?
items.answer: No. AI agents take over repetitive and time-consuming tasks, allowing your team to focus on strategic and creative activities that require human judgment.

items.question: What systems can be integrated with AI agents?
items.answer: Our agents integrate with most popular systems: CRM (Salesforce, HubSpot), ERP (SAP, Odoo), ticketing systems, email, chat platforms, and many more.

items.question: What are the costs?
items.answer: Costs depend on the solution's complexity. We offer free consultation to assess needs and propose a solution with transparent budget. Typical ROI is 3-6 months.

meta.title: About Us - GENERATIVA | AI Agents for Business
meta.description: We're the team behind AI agents that respond to your customers 24/7. Learn our story, values, and why businesses across Europe choose us.

hero.title: Building the future of customer communication
hero.subtitle: We're not just another AI agency. We're people who saw how businesses lose customers because of an unanswered call at 10 PM. And we decided to fix it.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: It all started with a simple question: Why does a dental clinic lose new patients just because reception closes after 6 PM?
We saw excellent businesses - dedicated doctors, restaurants with amazing food, trustworthy auto shops - losing customers because they couldn't answer the phone after hours.
It wasn't their fault. It was a human limitation that technology can solve.
That's how GENERATIVA was born: from the desire to give every business an assistant that never sleeps, never gets tired, and never forgets to be polite.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We enable every business to give their customers the experience they deserve - fast, professional responses at any hour. Not because AI is cool, but because your customers deserve more than a voicemail.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.subtitle: Three principles that guide every project

items.title: Technology with Soul
items.description: Our AI agents don't sound like robots. They're trained to be warm, empathetic, and solve real problems. Because a frustrated customer needs help, not an automated menu.

items.title: Integrates, Doesn't Replace
items.description: We don't come to disrupt what already works. Our agents connect to your existing systems - CRM, calendar, email - and work alongside your team.

items.title: Results, Not Promises
items.description: We don't sell dreams. We show you exactly how many calls you missed last month and how many you can recover. If we don't see clear ROI, we tell you upfront.

whyUs.title: Why GENERATIVA?
whyUs.subtitle: In a market full of AI buzzwords, here's what sets us apart

items.title: Local Market Focus
items.description: We understand local markets. Our agents speak naturally, know industry specifics, and integrate with popular local systems.

items.title: Demo Before Promises
items.description: Don't take our word for it. We show you live how an AI agent works for your business, with real scenarios from your industry.

items.title: Partner, Not Vendor
items.description: We don't disappear after implementation. We monitor performance, continuously optimize, and are just a phone call away when you need us.

items.title: Transparent Pricing
items.description: No hidden costs, no surprises. You know exactly what you pay and what you get. And if it doesn't work, you don't pay.

cta.title: Let's see if we can help
cta.subtitle: A 15-minute conversation shows us if we're a good fit. No sales pitches, no pressure - just clarity.

meta.title: AI Process Automation | GENERATIVA
meta.description: Eliminate repetitive work from your business with AI agents. 60-80% time reduction, zero errors, positive ROI in 3 months. Request a free audit.
meta.schemaDescription: Business process automation service using intelligent AI agents. We eliminate repetitive work, reduce errors and free your team for strategic activities.
meta.schemaOffer: Free process audit and personalized consultation

hero.title: AI Process Automation
hero.subtitle: We eliminate repetitive work from your business. Our AI agents take over manual tasks, reduce errors and free your team for what truly matters. Implementation in weeks, not months, with measurable results from the first month.

processTypes.title: What business processes can be automated with AI?
processTypes.lead: Nearly any repetitive, rule-based process can be automated with AI. From document processing to customer communication, AI agents take over tasks that consume time and resources, allowing your team to focus on strategic activities.

items.title: Document & data processing
items.description: Automatic extraction of information from invoices, contracts, forms and emails. Classification, validation and entry into existing systems without manual intervention.

items.title: Customer communication
items.description: Automated responses to frequently asked questions, appointment confirmations, notifications and request follow-ups across all channels: phone, email, WhatsApp, chat.

items.title: Approval & decision workflows
items.description: Automate leave requests, budget approvals, order validation and document routing to responsible parties with automatic notifications and escalations.

items.title: Reporting & analytics
items.description: Automatic generation of daily, weekly or monthly reports. Data aggregation from multiple sources, anomaly detection and insight delivery to management teams.

items.title: Client/employee onboarding
items.description: Automated registration, document verification, account creation, initial training and follow-up processes. Consistent experience for every new person.

items.title: Monitoring & alerts
items.description: Continuous monitoring of KPIs, stock levels, deadlines and team performance. Automatic alerts when something deviates from normal parameters.

approach.title: How does AI automation implementation work?
approach.lead: Implementing AI automation doesn't mean replacing everything overnight. Our 5-step process ensures each automation is tested, validated and gradually adopted by your team, with visible results even during the pilot phase.
approach.schemaDescription: The complete process for automating business processes, from initial audit to continuous optimization.

steps.title: Process audit
steps.description: We analyze your current processes, identify the most time-consuming ones and calculate automation potential. You receive a clear report with prioritized recommendations.

steps.title: Solution design
steps.description: We architect the AI solution tailored to your needs. We define integrations, data flows and success metrics before writing the first line of code.

steps.title: Key process pilot
steps.description: We implement automation on a single critical process to demonstrate value. Your team tests, provides feedback and we see real results in 2-4 weeks.

steps.title: Gradual scaling
steps.description: After pilot validation, we extend automation to the other identified processes. Each extension follows the same cycle: implementation, testing, validation.

steps.title: Continuous optimization
steps.description: We monitor performance, adjust based on real data and add new capabilities as the AI learns from accumulated interactions.

benefits.title: What results does AI process automation deliver?
benefits.lead: Companies that implement AI automation see concrete results in the first months: time recovered, errors eliminated and costs reduced. Here's what you can expect from working with GENERATIVA.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about process automation
faq.lead: We've answered the most common questions we receive from companies interested in AI process automation.

items.question: How much does AI process automation cost?
items.answer: The cost depends on process complexity and the number of required integrations. We offer a free audit where we evaluate your processes and propose a solution with transparent pricing. Generally, the investment pays for itself within the first 3 months through saved time and resources.

items.question: How long does automation implementation take?
items.answer: The pilot on a single process takes 2-4 weeks. Scaling to additional processes adds 2-3 weeks per process. A complete implementation for 3-5 processes fits within 2-3 months.

items.question: What processes can be automated with AI?
items.answer: Any repetitive, rule-based process: document processing, customer communication, approvals, reporting, onboarding and monitoring. If your team repeats the same actions daily, there's a good chance the process can be automated.

items.question: Will AI replace my employees?
items.answer: No. The purpose of automation is to eliminate repetitive tasks that consume time, not to replace people. Your employees will be freed to focus on strategic, creative and relational activities that require human judgment.

items.question: What ROI can I expect from automation?
items.answer: Our clients see an average 60-80% reduction in time spent on automated processes and near-complete elimination of errors. Positive ROI typically appears within the first 3 months, with savings growing as new processes are added.

items.question: Does automation work for small companies?
items.answer: Absolutely. Small companies benefit the most from automation because resources are limited and every hour counts. Our solutions are scalable and adapt to the budget and needs of any company, from 5 to 500 employees.

cta.title: Let's identify the processes draining your time
cta.subtitle: Schedule a free process audit. In 30 minutes, we'll show you exactly where you're losing time and how AI can solve it.
